entries.name: Uncap frame rate
entries.description: Disables vertical sync, allowing the game to reach as high a frame rate as hardware will allow.

entries.name: Force 4:3 Aspect Ratio (Default)
entries.description: Adjusts the aspect ratio used during 2d sequences.

entries.name: Force 16:9 Aspect Ratio
entries.description: Adjusts the aspect ratio used during 2d sequences. The 16:9 option makes the pause screen and cutscenes work like Rare Replay.

entries.name: Force 2.35:1 Aspect Ratio
entries.description: Adjusts the aspect ratio used during 2d sequences.

entries.name: Prevent cutscene camera
entries.description: Prevents the camera from moving during cutscenes??? (Need to double check this one)

entries.name: Disable challenge pre-door cutscene camera switches
entries.description: Disables camera switches when a challenge begins. Doesn't save any time, but can be nice when combined with force 1.2s cutscenes.

entries.name: Disable door camera switch
entries.description: Prevent the camera from focusing doors during cutscenes.

entries.name: Disable celebrations
entries.description: Prevents all actors from using the "celebrate" strategy. This can save time from now showing celebration cutscenes after completing challenges, but can affect ghoulie behaviour.

entries.name: Prevent player walking to set destinations
entries.description: Prevents cooper from being forced to walk to specific positions in the game world. This has the largest effect during cutscenes.

entries.name: Prevent energy sapper
entries.description: Prevents energy sappers from affecting the player.

entries.name: Disable all challenges (guaranteed softlock)
entries.description: Prevents challenges from being added to the challenge list within rooms. The cutscene where challenges begin will still play, but the challenges will not be given to the player.

entries.name: World of Warcraft camera
entries.description: Makes the camera stiff and bound to the player, following them similarly to the WoW camera.

entries.name: Force 1sec cutscenes (BROKEN)
entries.description: Force all cutscenes to have a length of 1 second. This can notably cause many ghoulies to become stuck in walls and software many parts of the game, particularly relic store.

entries.name: Force 1.2sec cutscenes (PARTIALLY BROKEN)
entries.description: Force all cutscenes to have a length of 1.2 seconds. This fixes a majority of the rooms which break with a 1 second cutscene, but does NOT fix relic store.

entries.name: Remove Relic Store RNG
entries.description: Forces relic store so use the first available coffin instead of randomly choosing one.

entries.name: Disable reaper spawn
entries.description: Prevent the grim reaper from spawning when a challenge has been failed.

entries.name: Invis mode
entries.description: Makes all non-background items invisible. This includes the player, all ghoulies, powerups, etc.

entries.name: TRUE dark mode
entries.description: Skip the drawing of all non-fx objects.
